Flying

Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

editions.flavor: An Esper mage will leave a hole in your memory with surgical precision. A Grixis mage sees no reason to be so kind.

name: Breath of Malfegor
text: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.

editions.flavor: The draconic demon loomed over Dack, and he suddenly sensed he wasn't the only Planeswalker that Malfegor had encountered.
The blood of the demons quickened as their master rose over the battlefield. The blood of the angels also quickened: here was the chance to finally end the war started millennia ago.

Flash

Enchanted creature gets +3/-3.

editions.flavor:
"Sangrite is the dragon's beating heart. Little wonder, then, that so many fools' chests burst trying to contain it."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Sanity Gnawers
text: When Sanity Gnawers enters the battlefield, target player discards a card at random.

editions.flavor: The last thought to go through their victim's mind is the one they tear out through the scalp.

name: Sen Triplets
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target opponent. This turn, that player can't cast spells or activate abilities and plays with his or her hand revealed. You may play cards from that player's hand this turn.

editions.flavor: They are the masters of your mind.

name: Sewn-Eye Drake
text: Flying, haste

editions.flavor:
"Too wary to charge, too prudent to serve. Not anymore."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Shield of the Righteous
Sigil Captain
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature is 1/1, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

editions.flavor: "One sigil awarded for valor, the other awarded for surviving Hellkite's Pass."
"One sigil awarded for valor, the other awarded for surviving Hellkite's Pass."

name: Sigiled Behemoth
text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

editions.flavor:
"Do not mistake a behemoth's assistance for subservience."
—Mayael the Anima

name: Sigil of the Nayan Gods
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.
Cycling {G/W} ({G/W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

editions.flavor: As the elves learned the hymns of angels, the knights learned the roars of titans.

name: Singe-Mind Ogre
text: When Singe-Mind Ogre enters the battlefield, target player reveals a card at random from his or her hand, then loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

editions.flavor: Even the balmgivers of Bant couldn't heal the incurables, but sharing their torment helped.

name: Skyclaw Thrash
text: Whenever Skyclaw Thrash attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, Skyclaw Thrash gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Their newfound wings shined elegantly and functioned partially.

name: Slave of Bolas
text: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas
editions.flavor: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

name: Soul Manipulation
text:
Choose one or both —
• Counter target creature spell.

editions.flavor:
"Birth and death are both reversible."
—Nicol Bolas

"Birth and death are both reversible."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Soulquake
text: Return all creatures on the battlefield and all creature cards in graveyards to their owners' hands.

editions.flavor: The Maelstrom sent a wave of raw mana through the battlefield, carrying off the fighting and fallen alike.

name: Sovereigns of Lost Alara
text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may search your library for an Aura card that could enchant that creature, put it onto the battlefield attached to that creature, then shuffle your library.

name: Spellbound Dragon
text:
Flying
Whenever Spellbound Dragon attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Spellbound Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.

editions.flavor: A king in Jund, a serf in Esper.

name: Spellbreaker Behemoth
text:
Spellbreaker Behemoth can't be countered.
Creature spells you control with power 5 or greater can't be countered.

editions.flavor:
"Some think its immunity to countermagic evolved because of the constant mage attacks on Naya. I think it just ate a bunch of wizards."

editions.flavor: Sigils corrupted by outsiders do not lose their power, only their purity.

name: Talon Trooper
text: Flying

editions.flavor: "The volcanic winds make a maze of the skies of Jund. If we mean to invade, we must first learn their invisible paths."

name: Terminate
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

editions.flavor: For four nights following Ennor's death and the reclaiming of his etherium, its recipients were found slain, the etherium ripped from their bodies.

name: Vedalken Heretic
